title: Jax Rework
body:
- **Relentless Assault**
Jax's basic attacks apply stacks of Relentless Assault, which decrease the target's armour and magic resist by 3/6/9%, which stacks up to 3 times, and lasts 3 seconds or until a new target is hit.
- **Latern's Call**
_Mana: 50/60/70/80/90
Cooldown: 19/17/15/13/11 Seconds
Range: 500_
Jax marks a target with Latern's Call, any basic attack done by Jax to that target heals Jax for 5/10/15/20/25% of the damage dealt. The mark is removed after 5 seconds or on the fifth basic attack, which detonates Latern's Call, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+0.25 AD, +0.10 AP)
- **Latern's Flame**
_Mana: 45
Cooldown: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8_
Jax empowers his next basic attack with the Latern's Flame, dealing an additional 50/75/100/125/150 magic damage and an additional 25/50/75/100/125 (+0.5 AP) damage over 2 seconds.
- **Ultra Combatant**
_Range: +100/150/200/250/300
Mana: 15/30/45/60/75 per strike
Cooldown: 0 Seconds
Cast Time: 2 Seconds_
Jax meditates before releasing his inner form, with this, he is able to dash on all basic attacks, gaining bonus range. Jax can dash to allies dealing no damage and halving the cost.
- **Together as One**
_Mana: 100
Cooldown: 60/45/30_
Passive: Jax deals (0.1 AP) as magic damage on hit passively.
Active: Jax becomes one with his Latern, causing his strikes to count as 2 hits (all on-hit effects are proc twice) and causing Together as One's Passive to do True Damage instead of Magic Damage. Together as One lasts 5 Seconds.
